subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal lost his first match since reclaiming the No. 1 ranking this week, falling to Juan Martín del Potro, 6-2, 6-4, in the Shanghai Masters semifinals in China on Saturday.
snippet: Rafael Nadal lost his first match since reclaiming the No. 1 ranking this week, falling to Juan Martín del Potro, 6-2, 6-4, in the Shanghai Masters semifinals in China on Saturday.
